code: @Override public void configure() {     // set global cache on bean     BeanComponent bean = getContext().getComponent("bean", BeanComponent.class).     bean.setCache(true).     from("direct:noCache").to("bean:something?cache=false").     from("direct:cached").to("bean:something"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() {             // set global cache on bean             BeanComponent bean = getContext().getComponent("bean", BeanComponent.class).             bean.setCache(true).             from("direct:noCache").to("bean:something?cache=false").             from("direct:cached").to("bean:something").         }     }. }
